comment.author: 43387704@N06
comment._content:
My next door neighbour is 90 this September, his father was the post man in Borth for many years. He also saved a man from drowning. His name was William Williams and his son is called William Williams (Bill) Bill moved to Midlands because he did'nt want to work down the mines in Wales. 

I love Borth, brings back a lot of good childhood memories for me. 

I love this photo of the old sailors of Borth.
